weekly_top_story.headline: Escalating Protests in Iran Amid Government Crackdown and U.S. Threats of Military Intervention
weekly_top_story.summary: Massive protests across Iran have resulted in over 100 deaths and thousands detained, with President Trump considering military strikes, heightening risks of broader Middle East conflict and global instability.

stories.headline: Iran Warns of Action Against U.S. If Trump Orders Strikes as Security Forces Crush Protests
stories.summary: Iranian forces are intensifying efforts to suppress nationwide protests that have killed hundreds, while warning of retaliation to potential U.S. military action, potentially drawing in global powers.

stories.headline: Federal Prosecutors Resign Amid Turmoil Over Minnesota ICE Shooting Investigation
stories.summary: Several U.S. federal prosecutors have resigned over the handling of the investigation into the fatal shooting of Renée Good by ICE agents, sparking nationwide anti-ICE demonstrations and highlighting tensions in immigration enforcement.
